sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update Order Request to Prepared
Waiting until Order Task is Packing
Confirmation email

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Customer Name,

Your Order Trigger➛...➛Number is Delivered.

 

Thank you

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Order Request Preparing
Waiting until Order Task is Cooking

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Customer Name,

 

Thank you for placing orderTrigger➛...➛Number

We have received your order .

 

Thank you
Order {{Created or Updated_1.current.number}} has been received

Hi Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Customer Name,

 

Your OrderTrigger➛...➛Number is Ready to Pick up.

 

Thankyou
{{Created or Updated_1.current.number}} Order is Ready to Pick Up

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Waiting until Delivery Order Task in Delivered
Update Order Request record to Complete
Waiting until Delivery Order Task is Out for Delivery
Create a Delivery Task
Wait for Order Task is Prepared
